title: Heavier group 14-transition metal π-complex congeners
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00497C, Review Article
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Terrance J. Hadlington
Heavier derivatives of classical carbon-centred π-complexes have seen significant interest in recent decades. Their syntheses are discussed, along side a commentary on similarities and differences with the lightest congeners.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
